main.description: An identity claim linking this DID to an external account

claimUri.description: The identity claim URI (e.g., for github: https://gist.github.com/username/id, dns:example.com)

identity.description: Structured data about the claimed identity

sig.description: Cryptographic attestation signature from the keytrace service

comment.description: Optional user-provided label for this claim

status.description: Current verification status of this claim. Absent on legacy records, treated as 'verified'.

statusSig.description: Cryptographic attestation for the current status fields. Proves status/lastVerifiedAt/failedAt were set by the keytrace service, not tampered with.

lastVerifiedAt.description: Timestamp of the most recent successful re-verification by the system

failedAt.description: Timestamp when the claim last failed re-verification or was retracted

prerelease.description: Whether this claim was created during the prerelease/alpha period

identity.description: Generic identity data for the claimed account

displayName.description: Display name if different from subject
